pages.text: Informuyutʹ yikh shcho voda povynna buty rozdilena sered nykh; (verblyud) povynen buty dozvolenyy shchob vypyty na yiy pryznachenyy denʹ
Ale vony perekonaly yikhnʹoho tovarysha ubyty (verblyud), ta vin zobov'yazanyy
Otzhe, yak strashnyy Miy retribution! Vony buly poperedzheni
My poslaly na nykh odyn udar, whereupon vony staly lyublyatʹ zibrane urozhay sino
My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
lyudy Doli vidkhylyly poperedzhennya
My showered yim z skelyamy. Tilʹky rodyna Doli bula vryatovana u svitanku
My blahoslovyly yoho ta yoho rodynu; my takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo appreciative
Vin poperedyv yikh pro nash requital, ale vony ridiculed poperedzhennya
Vony vely perehovory z nym pro yoho hosti; my blinded yim. Zaznayte Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni
Rano nastupne ranok, spustoshlyvyy retribution vrazyty yikh
Zaznayutʹ Moho retribution; vy buly poperedzheni
My zrobyly Quran lehki dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Pharaoh lyudy buly poperedzheni
Vony vidkhylyly vsi nashi znaky. Otzhe, my requited yim yak Mohutniy, Omnipotent musytʹ
vashi disbelievers krashche nizh disbelievers? Vy uvilʹnyuvalysʹ svyatym pysannyam
Mozhlyvo vony dumayutʹ, "My budemo peremozhtsi
Usi budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky; vony povernutʹsya navkolo ta tikayutʹ
Hodyna ochikuye yikh, ta Hodyna ye daleko hirsha ta bilʹshe bolisnyy
Zvychayno, vynuvatyy astray, ta zakinchatʹsya u Pekli
Vony budutʹ tyahnutysya u hellfire, forcibly. Zaznayte ahoniyi retribution
Vse utvorene my akuratno obmiryuyetʹsya
